ai-tika-s0402t45:2_1: First the second hermitage is seen (therefore), unattached to the houseless,
ai-tika-s0402t45:2_3: The rest is the same as in the case.
ai-tika-s0402t45:2_4: The second section on the Absorption
ai-tika-s0402t45:3_0: The colour of the head hairs is finished.
ai-tika-s0402t45:4_0: Talking in the flourishing of the yellow, etc.,
ai-tika-s0402t45:5_1: Eight Buddhas: Paccekabuddhas who has been performed in eight ways undercovering faith, whose mind has been constructed with wisdom in the Paṭisambhidā, the Paccekabuddhas, and is connected with the perfection of shrines.
ai-tika-s0402t45:5_3: the wisdom there is from being inspired, is the knowledge of patience,
ai-tika-s0402t45:5_4: who know, “Having no use,” they thus said, “They are reborn in the next life.”
ai-tika-s0402t45:5_5: for the sake of places: or for any reason.
ai-tika-s0402t45:5_6: There are nine wayss known by the nine kinds of clear vision.
ai-tika-s0402t45:6_0: The conclusion of the Wheel of the Three Times is finished.
ai-tika-s0402t45:7_0: The commentary on the colours is finished.
